entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle and Fog, 2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 08:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Light Drizzle and Fog
Temperature: 2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 2.0°C
Wind: SSE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:57 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or drizzle changing to a few flurries or drizzle near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 07:57 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High plus 4.
